name: Curve
description: Curve. This curve contract enables an IBCO (Initial Bonding Curve Offering) as a mechanism to launch a token into the open market without having to raise the funds in a traditional manner. This product is a beta. Use at your own risk.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokens
parameterDecorators.description: : The number of tokens being bought.

returnDecorators.description: uint256: The cost price of the number of tokens in collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokens
parameterDecorators.description: : The number of tokens being sold.

returnDecorators.description: uint256: The sell price of the number of tokens in collateral.
